description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Swim, attack, eat, and engineer your species to take over the world in this action/simulation/strategy game. All species are randomly generated for a new experience every game.
description.short: Swim, attack, eat, and engineer your species to take over the world in this action/simulation/strategy game. All species are randomly generated for a new experience every game.
